If you care about your skin, don\'t use chemical hair removers, choose the natural alternative.Cold Wax removes all types of hair, female & male, fine, coarse, or tough hair. Thanks to Cold Wax, waxing has never been faster or easier. Just spread the wax, press on the applicator strip, and remove in one quick motion.Cold Wax\'s fast & easy method removes unwanted hair from the roots leaving your skin silky smooth for up to six weeks. Repeated use of Cold Wax weakens the hair folicle which inhibits regrowth resulting in finer, sparser.- Using:Step 1:\xc2\xa0Keep the skin clean before waxing (you can use\xc2\xa0Pre-wax\xc2\xa0to easy cleaning your skin perfectly)Step 2:\xc2\xa0Remember the direction of the hair growth.Step 3:\xc2\xa0Rub the wax strip by hands for 30 seconds, then peel the two strips apart, apply one of them to the area where you want to remove hair.Step 4:\xc2\xa0Firmly smooth it in the same direction as hair growth, for approximately 10 seconds, ensuring strip is securely fixed to skin.Step 5:\xc2\xa0Holding the skin taut to avoid discomfort, immediately pull the strip back on itself against the direction your hair growth, keep the strip as close to the skin as possible.Step 6:\xc2\xa0Remove excess wax on skin with either a clean cotton wool pad or tissue. DO NOT use soap, or alcohol to clean skin after waxing. We suggest to moistened with\xc2\xa0after wax\xc2\xa0to protect your skin.\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0 Cold Wax Strip * 1 pairs =\xc2\xa02pcs (Can be used 2 times)\xe3\x80\x80- Cold Wax Strip * 10 pairs =\xc2\xa020pcs (Can be used 20 times)- Cold Wax Strip * 20 pairs = 40pcs (Can be used 40 times)\n- Cold Wax Strip * 50 pairs = 100pcs (Can be used 100 times)\n\xe2\x98\x85We accept Paypal only. Cellton Gel is a regenerative Caracol has qualities, moisturizing, rejuvenating and nourishing exfolidoras. Perfect to help reduce blemishes, acne and scars. Snail Cream contains powerful natural ingredients including: Allantoin, Elastin, Collagen, Glycolic Acid, natural peptides, proteins and vitamins. Allantoin: This is the natural ingredient that helps the Cellton to regenerate its skin and shell, does the same with the skin. Collagen and Elastin: These are the main elements of the connective tissue of the skin. Glycolic Acid: It allows for cleaning and exfoliation of the skin. Natural Peptides, fights bacteria and impurities that attack the skin, helping to fight acne and blemishes. Proteins and Nutrients nourish and protect skin. Helping to reduce acne. The Cellton Gel is the perfect solution for any skin problem helping you look younger. The Cardslide is a useful addition tothe Cardprotector, suitable for business cards and banknotes, for example. It has slimline finishing touches from stainlesssteel.Winner of the prestigious Red Dot Design Award, the SECRID CardSlide is perfect for those who love the design of the CardProtector, but need just a little more storage - without sacrificing style, design or size. Adding a highly useful and functional sliding compartment to the CardProtector, the CardSlide allows you to not only protect your six most important cards, both against bending and breaking and against RFID skimming, but also have room to store extra cards, cash, business cards, a key or even customise your wallet.At just 17mm thick the CardSlide stores up to:6 cards with easy access inside the CardProtector (5 plain + 1 with embossed numbers), or;5 cards with easy access inside the CardProtector (2 Plain + 3 with embossed numbers)Additional cards, notes, a key, photo, parking tickets or other small items in the CardSlideMATERIALHousing: Solid Aluminium, ElasticConstruction: stainless steel and POMDIMENSIONSProduct: 68 x 104 x 17 mmPackaging: 78 x 111 x 20 mmWEIGHTProduct: 70 gramsProduct in packaging: 100 gramsGASTO DE ENVIO GRATUITOPENINSULAPara los envios aBaleares, Canarias, Ceuta y Melilla, tienen recargo,\xc2\xa0 contactar antes derealizar la compra. We will send order dispatch notification email to you with tracking number and expected delivery date: usually 4 to 24 business days from the order dispatch date. Please note that it is only a suggested date, it may vary. (Especially during festive seasons like Easter or Christmas)Undeliverable package: When we received orders returned to us with incorrect address, failed delivery attempts or refused by recipient, we will contact the customer to clarify delivery information or reasons for refusal. Depending on the situation, we may issue a refund or reship.\xc2\xa0Reship: If the customer wants the order to be reshipped, we will resend the products charging 15% of the product price/total order amount as shipping charge.Refund: A 15% restocking fee of the total product price will be charged on returns of undeliverable or unclaimed orders and it would be deducted before issuing the refund. We are sorry that refund would not be possible if the parcel is not returned to us by the customs department.The "total" amount displayed at checkout is not inclusive of any taxes and duty. Depending on the geographical locations, you may be required to pay an additional amount for customs clearance and/or duty at the destination country. All these additional charges must be borne by the recipient. We regret that we have no control over these charges and cannot predict what they may be. For further details, please contact your local customs authority. Please note we are not in a position to refund any customs/import duties paid. If any order is refused due to these reasons, buyer will be responsible for the return shipping charges and 15% administration fee of the total product price.You may return the products within 14 days of your purchase. The Cosme De Net Group was established by a Japanese entrepreneur, it has over 10 years of experience with core business in retail and wholesale of international skincare and cosmetic products. The Group is equipped with experienced purchasing team, logistics team and customer service team. It has all the great characteristics of solid gold jewelry without price tag . Please do not compare gold filled jewelry to plated jewelry (usually only 3 mil layer) as there is no comparison, gold filled is much more valuable and tarnish resistant than plated. It does not flake off, tarnish or discolor. It is extremely long lasting and if taken care of will last you a lifetime. Gold filled jewelry is an economical alternative to solid gold jewelry! Although it isn\xe2\x80\x99t solid gold jewelry.\xc2\xa0What causes gold to be different colors ?\xc2\xa0While pure gold is a warm yellow, it can be manufactured in a wide variety of colors-including pink, white, green, blue or gray-by being mixed with different metals. For example, when silver and copper are added to pure gold, it turns yellow. When nickel or palladium (or zinc and copper) are added, gold turns white. Pure gold combined with silver, copper and zinc results in green gold. And pink gold is made when copper is mixed with pure gold.\xc2\xa0What is the best way to care for the gold filled jewelry ?\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Do not wear your jewelry in hot tubs and swimming pools. Take jewelry off when using laundry or cleaning products. NEVER, NEVER clean it with bleach.Use jewelry cleaner and a soft cloth to clean your gold filled jewelry .If you do not have jewelry cleaner, you can use mild soap and warm water. Never use any harsh cleaners such as bleach or abrasives. \xc2\xa0To store gold filled jewelry, wrap each piece separately in a soft cloth. Lay herringbone chains flat so they do not kink. Always remember to remove your jewelry before sleeping, bathing or exercising.Return Policy:\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0We accept returns within 30 days you are received the item, Buyer pay shipping fee.In case you received a wrong item, Items must be returned in its original and unused condition & must also be in its original box and packing.We do not allow refunds or exchanges because of change of mind. It has all the great characteristics of solid gold jewelry without price tag . Please do not compare gold filled jewelry to plated jewelry (usually only 3 mil layer) as there is no comparison. It is extremely long lasting and if taken care of will last you a lifetime.Gold filled jewelry is an economical alternative to solid gold jewelry! These FDA approved pain reliever capsules acts fast inside the body to offer quick and temporary relief from above mentioned conditions. It must essentially be mentioned that this liquid migraine medicine has a combination of Ibuprofen in it. The dosage of this medicine should be 40 ct and 200 Mg.Advil Liquid Filled Capsules:Migraine pain reliever40ct, 200mgWith IbuprofenIntroductionStart controlling the migraine, before the migraine takes control of you!Advil\xc2\xae Migraine is clinically proven to relieve migraine pain and related symptoms like nausea, and sensitivity to light and sound. Advil\xc2\xae Migraine is the only FDA approved migraine medicine in a liquid-filled capsule. It gets into your system fast. Advil\xc2\xae Migraine lets you start controlling your migraines-before they control you.\xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0 \xc2\xa0IngredientsActive Ingredients (In Each Brown Oval Capsule) Solubilized Ibuprofen Equal To 200Mg Ibuprofen (Nsaid)* - Purpose Pain Reliever. (Present As The Free Acid And Potassium Salt) *Nonsteroidal Anti-Inflammatory Drug). Inactive Ingredients: D&C Yellow No.10, FD&C Green No.3. FD&C Red No.40, Gelatin, Light Mineral Oil, Potassium Hydroxide, Purified Water, Sorbitan, Sorbitol.DirectionsDirections: Do Not Take More Than Directed. The Smallest Effective Dose Should Be Used. Adults. Take 2 Capsules With A Glass Of Water. If Symptoms Persist Or Worsen, Ask Your Doctor. Do Not Take More Than 2 Capsules In 24 Hours, Unless Directed By A Doctor. Under 18 Years Of Age Do Not Take More Than 2 Capsules In 24 Hours, Unless Directed By A Doctor. Other Information: Each Capsule Contains: Potassium 20Mg. Read All Directions And Warnings Before Use. Keep Carton. Store At 20-25 C (68-77). Avoid Excessive Heat Above 40 C (104 F). Read And Keep Carton For Complete Warnings And Information. Do Not Use If Seal Under Bottle Cap Imprinted With Sealed For Your Protection Is Broken Or Missing.WarningsAllergy Alert: Ibuprofen May Cause A Severe Allergic Reactions, Especially In People Allergic To Aspirin. Symptoms May Include: Hives, Asthma (Wheezing), Skin Reddening, Blisters, Facial Swelling, Shock, Rash. If An Allergic Reaction Occurs, Stop Use And Seek Medical Help Right Away. Stomach Bleeding Warning: This Product Contains A Nonsteroidal Anti-Inflammatory Drug (Nsaid), Which May Cause Stomach Bleeding. The Chance Is Higher If You: Are Age 60 Or Older. Have Had Stomach Ulcers Or Bleeding Problems. Take A Blood Thinning (Anticoagulant) Or Steroid Drug. Take Other Drugs Containing An Nsaid [Aspirin, Ibuprofen, Naproxen, Or Others]. Have 3 Or More Alcoholic Drinks Every Day While Using This Product. Take More Or For A Longer Time Than Directed. Do Not Use: If You Have Ever Had An Allergic Reaction To Any Other Pain Reliever/Fever Reducer. Right Before Or After Heart Surgery. Ask A Doctor Before Use If You Have Ever Had Migraines Diagnosed By Health Professional. A Headache That Is Different From Your Usual Migraines. The Worst Headache Of Your Life. Fever And Stiff Neck. Headaches Beginning After Or Caused By Head Injury, Exertion, Coughing Or Bending. Experienced Your First Headache After The Age Of 50. Daily Headaches. A Migraine So Severe As To Require Bed Rest. Problems Or Serious Side Effects From Taking Pain Relievers Or Fever Reducers. Stomach Problems That Last Or Come Back, Such As Heartburn, Upset Stomach, Or Stomach Pain Ulcers. High Blood Pressure. Taken A Diuretic. Bleeding Problems. Heart Or Kidney Disease. Reached Age 60 Or Older. Ask A Doctor Or Pharmacist Before Use If You Are. Taking Any Other Drug Containing An Nsaid (Prescription Or Nonprescription). Taking A Blood Thinning (Anticoagulant) Or Steroid Drug. Under A Doctor\'s Care For Any Serious Condition. Taking Aspirin For Heart Attack Or Stroke, Because Ibuprofen May Decrease This Benefit Of Aspirin. Taking Any Other Drug. When Using This Product. Take With Food Or Milk If Stomach Upset Occurs. Long Term Continuous Use May Increase The Risk Of Heart Attack Or Stroke. Stop Use And Ask A Doctor If You Feel Faint, Vomit Blood, Or Have Bloody Or Black Stools. These Are Signs Of Stomach Bleeding. Migraine Headache Pain Is Not Relieved Or Gets Worse After First Dose. Stomach Pain Or Upset Gets Worse Or Lasts. Any New Symptoms Appear. If Pregnant Or Breast-Feeding, Ask A Health Professional Before Use. It Is Especially Important Not To Use Ibuprofen During The Last 3 Months Of Pregnancy Unless Definitely Directed To Do So By A Doctor Because It May Cause Problems In The Unborn Child Or Complications During Delivery. Keep Out Of Reach Children. In Case Of Overdose, Get Medical Help Or Contact A Poison Control Center Right Away.\xc2\xa0TERMS OF PAYMENTS :\xc2\xa0We only accept payments through PayPal. The arrival of high-tech cards caused a rapid replacement of these traditional means of payment. This new era of technology calls for an innovative type of wallet. One that protects both your privacy and your money. The Secrid wallet does exactly that both in terms of security and style. The Cardprotector is the core of the Secrid product line. The aluminium Cardprotector protects your most important cards, both against bending and breaking and against your RFID cards being scanned if you don\'t want them to be (such as the transportation pass, ID card, the latest credit cards and business cards). The Cardslide is the latest product in the Secrid collection and adds just that little bit more space to the Cardprotector - for example for cash, business cards, parking tickets, a key or a nice photo in the transparent version. Some cards have thickened letters, this is called embossing. You can store up to six cards in the Cardprotector, including one with embossing. Or up to five cards, three of which with embossing. Designed and manufactured to the highest standards in the Netherlands, each Secrid product comes with a two year guarantee. Please select and order all fragrance products with care as we are unable to accept returns on Fragrances due to transportation restrictions. A courier can be arranged at the buyers expense for high priced fragrance returns.\nCancellations:Unfortunately we cannot accept cancellations as orders are dispatched immediately. Silicon Stop Snoring Nose Clip Anti Snore Sleep Apnea Aid Device Night Tray\n>>Description\nDescriptionSnoring in general is caused by over-relaxation of the upper airway. Snoring always happens during less deep sleep. A normal and healthy sleep cycle should include aleast 25% at deep sleep, so not only are you disturbing your sleeping partner, you are also not getting the quality deep sleep that your body needs to rest and regenerate.This ingenious little device controls snoring when sleeping without interfering the normal sleep cycle.Avoids soft turbinate dropping and helps rest the tongue at normal position, thus opening up the nose cavity while breathing during sleep.Features*Effectively helps resolve mild to moderate snoring problems*No more sleepless night*Magnet insider the noseclip assists the elderly for normal nasal respiration/breathing*Made from quality silicone material*Comfortable and gently fits nostrils*Very easy to useEasy to clean*Come with a travel case for safe storage and easy carrying*Approx Size: 1.8cm x 1.5cm x 0.6cm*Color:TransparentHow to use the Anti Snoring Device:1.The anti snoring device will fit any shape of nostrils2.Place the protruding round tips towards the upper nostrils and place inwards3.Fits gently into nostrils, holding them wider apart and making breathing easier and quieter4.It is safe, convenient and reusable5.This product is made of high-tech 100% silicone gel6.It may take up to 3 days to a week to adapt to using the devicePackage includes1 x Clear Silicone Anti Snore Clip1 x Clear Carrying case\n>>Payment\nWe\xc2\xa0only\xc2\xa0accept\xc2\xa0payment\xc2\xa0through\xc2\xa0Paypal.\nIf\xc2\xa0you\xc2\xa0don\'t\xc2\xa0have\xc2\xa0Paypal\xc2\xa0account,\xc2\xa0please\xc2\xa0register\xc2\xa0at\xc2\xa0www.paypal.com.\nPayment\xc2\xa0must\xc2\xa0be\xc2\xa0received\xc2\xa0within\xc2\xa07\xc2\xa0days\xc2\xa0after\xc2\xa0auctions\xc2\xa0ended.\xc2\xa0Unpaid\xc2\xa0dispute\xc2\xa0will\xc2\xa0be\xc2\xa0filed\xc2\xa0to\xc2\xa0eBay\nfor\xc2\xa0the\xc2\xa0non\xc2\xa0payable\xc2\xa0bidders.\n>>Shipping\n1. It has all the great characteristics of solid gold jewelry without price tag . Please do not compare gold filled jewelry to plated jewelry (usually only 3 mil layer) as there is no comparison, gold filled is much more valuable and tarnish resistant than plated. It does not flake off, tarnish or discolor. It is extremely long lasting and if taken care of will last you a lifetime. Gold filled jewelry is an economical alternative to solid gold jewelry! Although it isn\xe2\x80\x99t solid gold jewelry.\xc2\xa0What causes gold to be different colors ?\xc2\xa0While pure gold is a warm yellow, it can be manufactured in a wide variety of colors-including pink, white, green, blue or gray-by being mixed with different metals. For example, when silver and copper are added to pure gold, it turns yellow. When nickel or palladium (or zinc and copper) are added, gold turns white. Pure gold combined with silver, copper and zinc results in green gold. And pink gold is made when copper is mixed with pure gold.\xc2\xa0What is the best way to care for the gold filled jewelry ?\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Do not wear your jewelry in hot tubs and swimming pools. Take jewelry off when using laundry or cleaning products. NEVER, NEVER clean it with bleach.Use jewelry cleaner and a soft cloth to clean your gold filled jewelry .If you do not have jewelry cleaner, you can use mild soap and warm water. Never use any harsh cleaners such as bleach or abrasives. \xc2\xa0To store gold filled jewelry, wrap each piece separately in a soft cloth. Lay herringbone chains flat so they do not kink. Always remember to remove your jewelry before sleeping, bathing or exercising.Return Policy:\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0We accept returns within 14 days you are received the item, Buyer pay shipping fee.In case you received a wrong item, Items must be returned in its original and unused condition & must also be in its original box and packing.We do not allow refunds or exchanges because of change of mind. By law, we must declare all items at the value of payment received and cannot alter this amount to decrease international custom fees. The recipient of an international shipment may be subject to such Import Fees and administrative fees which are levied once a shipment reaches your country. Additional charges for customs clearance must be borne by the recipient; we have no control over these charges. Customs policies vary widely from country to country; you should contact your local customs office for further information. When customs clearance procedures are required, it can cause delays beyond our control and beyond the original delivery estimates.\nIf you refuse a shipment from AreaTrend, you will be responsible for the original shipping charges, any customs or taxes, and the cost of returning the package to AreaTrend. This amount will be deducted from your merchandise refund. In the event that the return fee exceeds the order total, the package will be abandoned and you will not be refunded. DescriptionIntroduce:Healthy skin should be around ph 4.5 - 6.5.Bacteria actively grow under high ph therefore we need the skin care product that can balance the ph for us.Sebum contains Fatty Acid and our sweat contains Lactic Acid,therefore oily skin = lower phdry skin = higher ph.Konjac sponge is about ph 6.2 which is close to the ph of Milk.The konjac sponge is made from a natural food material which is called Konjac(in Japan it\'s known as Konnyaku).Konjac is a perennial herb in aroid family and since ancient times, it has been widely used as a medical and edible natural plant.Konjac is a popular and healthy vegetable in Korea and Japan. Being unbelievably soft and gentle, konjac sponge exfoliates dead cells while wiping the face and body, and leaves behind a colloid film to nourish and protect your skin.A Konjac Sponge contains no preservatives or artificial pigment.It\'s perfect for cleansing even the most sensitive skin!This Facial Cleansing Sponge absorbs water well. This facial cleansing sponge provides soft and hygienic usage for ladies. Add to that the shippingcontainer costs of $1.00 plus the cost to print the label, tape, ink, paper,etc. and our actual shipping cost is over $5.00 and we pay about $50,000 peryear for shipping. WHAT IT IS\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Toppik Hair Building Fibers, made of colored keratin protein, blend undetectable with existing hair strands to instantly create the appearance of naturally thick, full hair. Hair building fibers (or sometimes known as hair filler fibers) are a completely different approach to building thicker hair while immediately providing the illusion of the same. They are electrostatically charged fibers made from different materials. The higher quality ones are made of natural fibers.\xc2\xa0WHAT IT DOES\xc2\xa0Instantly fills in thinning areas\xc2\xa0 Conceals hair loss Makes fine hair look completely thick and full Great as a root touch-up between colorings\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0WHAT ELSE YOU NEED TO KNOW\xc2\xa0Toppik Hair Fibers resist wind, rain, and perspiration for long-lasting results in all conditions. Available in nine shades that can be mixed to match virtually any hair color, Hair Fibers work for all hair types and textures. Also great for part lines, covering extension tracks and touching up roots between hair color appointments. Easily washes out with shampoo.\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0NATURAL MAGNETISM\xc2\xa0Toppik gives the instant appearance of a thick, full head of hair. Toppik Hair Building Fibers are made from natural Keratin of the highest grade, the same type of protein found in real hair. The Fibers have a strong natural static charge that creates a magnetic effect, tightly binding Toppik Hair Building Fibers to even the finest strands of human hair. The results have changed the lives of millions of women and men from those struggling with fine or thinning hair to those with Alopecia or undergoing chemotherapy.\xc2\xa0SUGGESTED USEDry and style hair as usual. Shake or spray into thinning area. Gently pat hair to disperse fibers.You apply the fibers by sprinkling them over thinning areas of hair, tapping them down upon the scalp with your fingers. The fibers cling to the existing hair and scalp and can be\xc2\xa0 with a light application of hair spray. The hair filler fibers bind to individual hair shafts, making each strand of hair appear thicker. They will not brush out or blow off in the wind, but will provide a natural looking scalp cover and hair filler until your next shampoo, when they wash completely away. The fibers come in several color options and can be custom blended to create whatever shade is desired. One bottle will last for approximately a month depending how frequently and how much you use it.\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0INGREDIENTS\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Keratin, Ammonium Chloride, Silica, DMDM Hydantoin. May Contain/peut contenir/puede contener: Yellow 6 (CI 15985), Yellow 5 (CI 19140), Red 22 (CI 45380), Red 33 (CI 17200), Blue 1 (CI 42090), Green 5 (CI 61570), Green 3 (CI 42053), Green 6 (CI 61565), Orange 4 (CI 15510)\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0BENEFITS\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Toppik Hair Building Fibers instantly give you the look of thicker, fuller hair.WARNINGS:\xc2\xa0For external use only. If irritation or rash appears, discontinue use. Avoid contact with eyes. Avoid inhalation. 203\nDescription\nSpecification:Material: 80% polyester, 20% NylonCondition: Brand NewColor: As the pictures shownSize:Note:Please allow a little color deviation due to different display.Package included:\n1 x bra top\n1 x underwear bottomAttention to swimwear protect:Wash before wearing. Ordering Goods/Delivery PolicyAny order placed via our ebay shop will be processed once payment via Paypal has been received and confirmed via Paypal. Title to the goods will pass to you on the latter of the delivery of the goods. Goods will be at your risk from the time of delivery. The price that you pay will be as advertised on our ebay shop at the time when the order is placed. \xc2\xa0Goods will be delivered as quickly as possible and in any event we aim to despatch within 48 hours and delivery within 2/3 working days from despatch save in exceptional circumstances or due to matters outside of our control. If we are unable to deliver goods within this allocated time but are expecting stock, we will email you for your instructions with regards to the outstanding order. We reserve the right to cancel your order if for any reason we are unable to deliver your goods within this five working day period (48 hours despatch plus 2/3 working days delivery), in which event your payment will be refunded in full.4.1. Delivery ChargesWe endevour where popssible to offer free postage or a minimum charge to cover costs however delivery charges vary for parcels over 2kg in weight to the Highlands, Islands and Northern Island and so postage to these postcodes are priced per order (see Delivery Policy for applicable postcodes) \xc2\xa0Email us through our ebay shop for cost, we endevour to keep these delivery costs low and so only the cost based on the order weight and postcode will be charged. We will give you the cost before you place your order..We keep in stock approximately 100% of the products sold through our eBay store.4.2. Standard DeliveryWe aim to despatch within 24/48 hours, we use the trusted Royal Mail 2nd class as standard delivery for our delivery of parcels up to 2kg and a recognised Courier Company for all other parcels. Once despatched Royal Mail/Courier Company aim to deliver within 2/3 working days.4.3. UK Postcodes not covered by Standard Postage ChargesUnfortunately Couriers charge a premium for delivering to certain UK area\'s (Highlands, Islands and Northern Island) which is beyond our control, please check with us if your postcode falls within this category and therefore an excess charge may be added to our normal Standard Delivery charge dependant on the weight of your order. Please email us with your order requirements and postcode for a postage cost.Working days are Monday to Friday 9.00am - 3.00pm. All Orders recieved after 3.00pm on Friday will be processed next working day (Monday). Weekend orders taken will be processed on following Monday.We at angelfeetonline aim with our \'in-stock\' items to improve on these times quoted and use them as a guide. Cancelled Orders/ReturnsWe hope that you will be delighted with your purchase but if for whatever reason you change your mind and wish to cancel your order, you have 30 working days from receiving the order in which to cancel and receive a full refund including delivery charges. Refunds will be issued via your Paypal account.For safety and hygiene reasons we do not accept returns any personalised items.Please email us through our ebay shop with your reason for return and we will email you and instruct you where to send your returns to. Returned goods must be in original packaging or suitable secure packaging and we recommend that a recorded delivery/proof of postage is used as we are not liable for goods lost or damaged in transit. Goods returned to us will receive a full refund including delivery charge, however the returns postage costs are to be paid by Returnee. Once returned goods are received into our warehouse, they will be checked and a refund will be issued via Paypal. Should any item be returned to us and be deemed to have been mis-used by you , we will be unable to accept the return and issue a refund.6.2. Faulty GoodsWe quality check all our products before they leave our warehouse but if for whatever reason a product is faulty please email us within 24 hours through our ebay shop, briefly explain the fault and your requirements from us e.g. replace or refund. We will ask you to return the item to us using proof of postage and upon receipt at our warehouse, we will check the product and if deemed to be faulty, a full refund including all delivery charges incurred will be issued via your Paypal account.Please double check sizes as Products returned due to wrong measurement i.e. wrong size, will be exchanged or a refund issued, however the returns costs must be covered by the purchaser.6.3. ExchangesPlease, please double check the size If you purchase an item that is the wrong size we will exchange it for another size. If we are unable to do this we will offer you a refund, excluding any postage and packaging costs. Please refer to our size guides on each product as they do vary from Brand to Brand, to minimise the chance of the item being the wrong size, before placing an order. Please ensure that the item is returned back to us in an unused condition with all original labels still attached complete with any labels attached within 7 calendar days of the date the item is delivered to you. Please note, you will be responsible for the cost of returning the item and there will be an additional postage charge at the same rate as your original order for the replacement.7. Source Toothbrush Replacement Heads Super Soft\n- 2 PackRadius Source Toothbrush Replacement Heads Super Soft 2 PackRadius\xc2\xa0Source Toothbrush\xc2\xa0Replacement Heads Super Soft 2 Pack\xc2\xa0boast\xc2\xa0their signature bed of super-soft, fanned bristles in a swappable pair. Switching one spent head for another instead of purchasing an entirely new toothbrush reduces plastic consumption and waste by 93%. Now that\xe2\x80\x99s something to smile about! Great for\xc2\xa0gums, the unique curved bristle-bed ensures our super-soft bristles clean and massage the gum rather than aggravating them. Featuring premium bristles that are made from 100% vegetable-based nylon to reduce our dependence on fossil fuels. The bristles are arranged in an elegant tanned shape, designed to gently yet throoughly clean and invigorate the entire mouth. Complete with a longer\xc2\xa0neck\xc2\xa0which allows for a better reach. A long, thin neck makes cleaning tricky-to-reach spots much easier, all the way to the very last molar!\xc2\xa0\xc2\xa0Great for Gums. 100% vegetable-based nylon\xc2\xa0to reduce reliance on fossil fuels. Longer neck for a better reach. Made in the USA, BPA-free, Vegan and Cruelty-free.Why Does BPA-Free Matter?Bisphenol A (commonly referred to as BPA)-is a carbon-based synthetic compound that interferes with your hormones in a detrimental way, and is proven to be particularly damaging to the health of babies and young children. In other words, BPA isn\'t something you want anywhere near your mouth, let alone your child\'s. And yet it\'s commonly found in hard plastics like those used to produce water bottles, food packaging and even your typical toothbrushes. Radius can assure you that their products do not contain BPA. Never have. Never will. And, on the subject of unnecessary nasties, Radius products are also free from latex, phthalate, glutens, and non-FDA-approved colors and dyes.Carefully Crafted by an Architect to be Better by DesignThe architects who designed the Radius range of toothbrushes are professional sticklers for elegant design. Their first (r)evolutionary product, the Radius Original, is now displayed at the Smithsonian Institute National Design Museum. From there, they expanded their products to encompass a range of personal care and travel essentials that combine function and beauty in just the same way.Just like other everyday products that have "evolved" through beautiful, functional design (think Dyson vacuum cleaners and Lumbar chairs), Radius products are totally unique. Each one is devised for a specialized purpose, utilizing different materials and one-of-a-kind manufacturing techniques-because refining and evolving the tools of your daily life is what they\'re all about.Radius-Green for the Right ReasonsRadius takes a holistic approach to designing and manufacturing their products, examining every step of the process-from prototyping and manufacturing to distribution and disposal-to ensure it\'s rooted in sustainable decisions that reduce their carbon footprint.Efficient ManufacturingManufacturing right here in the USA, in their own Radius factory, gives them complete control over production from start to finish, ensuring quality stays where they want it to be-the best of the best. They make, package and ship all their own products small batch-style on low-energy machines, recycling imperfect items and eliminating waste as much as possible. Materials are hand-selected to ensure that no heavy metals or carcinogenic substances find their way into the products. Primarily they use bioplastics, which are derived from renewable biomass sources (like vegetable oils and timber), agricultural byproducts, or even used plastic bottles. They\'re better for the environment, as well, requiring less fossil fuels and energy to produce (resulting in fewer greenhouse gases).In 2011, they took their environmentally conscious ethics to the next level-investing in 50,000 kilowatt solar collectors for their factory, which allow them to generate 67% of their electrical power from the sun.Lasting Longer Than the AverageRadius toothbrushes and products are designed to outlast most run-of-the-mill alternatives, thereby producing less waste. For instance, their Original toothbrush has 300% more bristles than an average toothbrush, making it effective for up to nine months compared to the average three months. The Source toothbrush, on the other other hand, allows the user to replace worn heads with a new one when necessary, eliminating the need to throw away and replace the entire brush. Their impressive longevity is due to a combination of hard-wearing materials and smart design, which prevents the bristles from wearing down so quickly. You save money, and together you and Radius help reduce energy consumption and waste in landfills by decreasing the need to manufacture more products.Back to the EarthWhat happens after a Radius design is spent is also a concern of theirs. The thought of their products and their packaging sitting in a landfill makes them cringe, which is why they always consider the end of a product\'s life before they begin making it. Not only do they re-purpose recycled materials to create their brushes, holders and cases, where possible they make them compostable, biodegradable and 100% recyclable, too.The Radius Story An unlikely beginning... Their story begins on the pristine sandy beaches of Tortola, British Virgin Islands, where the idea for their (r)evolutionary Radius Original was dreamed up by two architects with an insatiable love for clever design. Kevin Foley and James O\'Halloran believed even the most everyday products could be refined and improved, starting with the humble toothbrush.From their CEO Saskia Foley to the hard-working employees in their solar-powered factory, Radius is proudly women-owned and family-run. They thrive thanks to the team of dedicated, smart, close-knit individuals behind the scenes and value the contribution of each and every one of them. In fact, at Radius HQ, they\'re more like family than colleagues.Vegetable-based bristles reduce dependency on fossil fuels/petroleum.ABOUT USSHIPPINGPAYMENTRETURNSCONTACT USUntitled DocumentAbout UsFor\nthose leading active, healthful lives LuckyVitamin is the inspirational\nand supportive source for products and knowledge dedicated to helping everyone on their journey towards happy wellness.\nFor\nover three generations we have been dedicated to helping people lead\nhealthy lives. No Saturday or Sunday delivery.\nAll\npackages are shipped with a verified FedEx, USPS or DHL tracking number\nfor online tracking and delivery confirmation. Expedited orders placed\nafter 1 PM (EST) may not process until the next business day. We strive\nto process all expedited orders placed before 1PM EST the same day\nprovided adequate stock is available and the order successfully passes\nall necessary verification processes. Orders received over the weekend\nmay not process for shipment until Monday. Shipping carriers may deliver\nyour package on a Saturday and do not deliver on national holidays.\nOrders\nto Alaska, Hawaii, Puerto Rico, Guam and the US Virgin Islands are\nshipped based on USPS real-time costs depending on the weight of the\npackage, delivery method and final destination.\nPLEASE NOTE:Packages\nless than 1 lb may ship via FexEx, USPS or DHL when our Standard\nShipping method is chosen. We ask that you please be aware of\nlocal custom and importation laws. Any additional charges for customs\nclearance must be paid by you. Customs policies vary widely from country\nto country; you should contact your local customs office or tax\nauthority for information specific to your situation. Additionally, when\nordering from LuckyVitamin.com, you are considered the importer of\nrecord and must comply with all laws and regulations of the country in\nwhich you are receiving the goods. Before you place your order, please\nbe sure of your local customs laws concerning the shipment of dietary\nsupplements. We cannot be held responsible or accountable for any taxes,\nduties, tariffs or any quarantine fees or package warehousing fees\nassessed by your local customs office. If an item is returned to us due\nto a customs related issue, you will be billed a 20% restocking fee. In\naddition, your credit card will be charged the extra shipping costs\nincurred by LuckyVitamin.com to retrieve your package. You will only be\ncredited for merchandise when the package is returned to us in the same\ncondition it was sent.\n*Note:\nCertain items (very few) may not be available for international\ndistribution due to manufacturer restrictions. International Checkout\nwill be disabled when these items are in your cart and are indicated on\nthe respective items detailed information page.\nTax Policy\nPennsylvania residents add 6% sales tax on all personal care products, aromatherapy, pet products, appliances and books.\nShipping Methods\nAll\norders are shipped via FedEx, USPS or DHL whenever possible. If FedEx\nshipping is not available in your area, your package will be shipped\nautomatically via standard USPS mail.\nBack Ordered Items\nOn\nrare occasions we may run out of stock of an item. This may cause a\nslight delay of shipment for your order. If an item you ordered is going\nto be backordered for an extended period of time, we will notify you\nvia e-mail of this delay and then automatically ship the products to you\nas soon as they are available.\nHere\nat LuckyVitamin.com we have a great relationship with our suppliers, so\nwe are usually able to get your products very quickly. If your\nbackordered item(s) will arrive in a timely manner, we will delay your\nshipping so we can send your order in its entirety. If we can not have\nyour item(s) soon after receipt of your order, we will ship your partial\norder and automatically ship the backordered item(s) as soon as they\nbecome available at no extra cost to you. In the event several items are\nbackordered, you may receive several partial shipments.\nOrder Status & Tracking\nAll\norders shipped will be provided with an online tracking number for\nstatus and location tracking. You can always e-mail or call us if you\'d\nlike to verify your order\'s status.\nDamaged & Incorrect Items\nIf\nyour item arrives damage or is incorrect, please notify us immediately\nvia e-mail or telephone so we can resolve any problems to your\nsatisfaction.\nCold-Pack Service\nWe\noffer a free cold pack service to insure the quality and potency of\ncertain temperature sensitive products. When you see the image below on\nan item\'s detail page, it indicates that item will ship with cold pack\nservice and we recommend you choose an expedited shipping method.\nYou\nmay also opt to include cold-pack service with your order by purchasing\na Cold-Pack. During the hotter months in order to insure the safety and\nintegrity of certain heat sensitive products and prevent melting,\ndeterioration or rancidity, it may require we pack product with\nfreeze-paks.\nWe recommend purchasing the Cold-Pack service with your\norder. We may also choose not to ship the product if the weekend will\ndelay final arrival. Based on the size and value of the order an\nadditional $3.50 packaging and handling fee may be required.\nIf any\ndelay or additional cost will incur we will contact you for approval.ABOUT USSHIPPINGPAYMENTRETURNSCONTACT USUntitled DocumentPayment Payment types we accept: PayPal, MasterCard, Visa, Discover, American ExpressABOUT USSHIPPINGPAYMENTRETURNSCONTACT USUntitled DocumentRefunds & Exchanges Unopened\nitems can be returned or exchanged for any reason. MaxAroma not only meets the needs of today\'s fashion-conscious and value-oriented consumers, but also succeeds in offering the highest quality of products at substantial savings.\nSHIPPING POLICY\nDomestic Shipments\nShipping Method\nFirst Item Shipping Fee\nSecond Item Shipping Fee\nDelivery Days\nStandard shipping\nFree\nFree\nup to 5-8 business days\nExpedited Shipping\n$5.99\nPer Package\n$4.99\nEach Additional Item\nup to 3-5 Business Days\nExpress Shipping\n$29.99\nPer Package\n$9.99\nEach Additional Item\n1-2 Business Days\nFedex Next day\n$49.95\nPer Package\n$9.99\nEach Additional Item\n1 Business Days\nNote: For Express Shipping the order has been placed by 1:00 pm the previous business day.\nCanada Shipments\nShipping Method\nFirst Item Shipping Fee\nSecond Item Shipping Fee\nDelivery Days\nStandard shipping\n$12.95\nPer Package\n$4.95\nEach Additional Item\nup to 7-10 Business Days\nExpedited Shipping\n$24.95\nPer Package\n$4.95\nEach Additional Item\nup to 5-8 Business Days\nInternational Shipments\nShipping Method\nFirst Item Shipping Fee\nSecond Item Shipping Fee\nDelivery Days\nUSPS Priority International Mail\n$39.95\nPer Package\n$5.99\nEach Addition Item\nup to 12-15 Business Days\nNote: All International orders will be shipped with USPS Priority Flat-Rate Shipping.\nShipping Policies for Returns &Exchanges\nIn cases of qualifying returns, the customer is responsible for any and all shipping and handling charges. Even if there were no initial shipping fees connected to the item.customer will be held responsible for all shipping charges of returned items. Such charges may include the cost of shipment for returning the item, applicable taxes, and any other qualifying fees that may apply. Any Shipping and Handling charges will not be refunded in cases of Returns, Exchanges, or Cancellations (considering the order has already been shipped).\nSales Tax\nPerAroma is a New York State based company. Therefore, all orders within the state of New York will be charged a local and county sales tax(8.875%) to be collected by the state. Any and all orders outside of New York State will be discharged from paying a sales tax. If you are ordering from outside of New York State, but notice a sales tax on your order, please change the Shipping Destination before submission of the order.\nSales Tax Policy on Returns and Exchanges\nSales taxes will be refunded fully on all qualifying returns, and may vary on Exchangeable item depending on the price of the item.\nShipping Methods and Delivery Charges\nThe costs of taxes or duties are excluded from the cost of shipping. For further information, please contact your local customs office to obtain details of shipping charges. In cases of PerAroma shipment refusals, the customer will be held accountable for original shipping costs, any duties, taxes, customs charges, and shipment fees for any returning packages back to PerAroma. In such a case, any of the qualifying fees will be deducted from the refund amount. PerAroma does not profit from the assigned shipping charges, and has made every attempt to reduce the costs of shipping charges for its customers. The law demands us to reveal the details of the package in value and content, and prohibits us from alteration of such information. Additional international shipping charges may apply, such as surcharges, and shipment cost for each additional item chosen. In rare cases of surcharges or delays in the order, the customer will be informed via telephone or e-mail of all additional costs.\nInternationally Restricted Products/Locations\nPerAroma is legally prohibited of shipping certain name-brands outside of the United States. Such brands include Dermalogica, IMAN, NYX Cosmetics and Jane Iredale. Also restricted by law, is the shipment of particular brands to the European Union. These brands include Davidoff, Joop!,Jil Sander, Nikos, J.Lo/Jennifer Lopez, Calvin Klein, Lancaster, Chloe, Marc Jacobs, Kenneth Cole, Sarah Jessica Parker "Covet", and Cerruti.\nFragrance items and products containing alcohol are categorized as "dangerous goods." We are restricted by international postal regulations to send such products by standard air-mail. All orders containing such items must be sent through Priority International Shipping via USPA. This way such items may be tracked with a tracking code.\nUnless a shipment is being sent to an APO/FPO U.S. Military address and U.S. Territories, the United States Postal Service is restricted to ship to certain countries. Expedited shipping services to APO/FPO U.S. Military addresses are not available, and shipments to such destinations may take up to 8 weeks.\nPAYMENT POLICY\nPayPal payment method are accepted and preferred. PayPal account can be registered at www.paypal.com with a valid e-mail address. You can conveniently link your bank account or credit card to you PayPal account to enjoy the simple electronic payment method throughout the internet. Please visit www.paypal.com for additional detail.\nPlease contact us if you have any question regarding credit card payment.\nWe accept payment via PayPal.\nPay Pal\nWe only ship to CONFIRMED ADDRESSES. We may contact you for additional information if necessary.\nRETURN POLICY\nAt MaxAroma, customer gratification is of our utmost concern and priority. This is why we have designed a Return and Exchange Policy that benefits our customers to the best of our capability. Because we strive to achieve 100% customer satisfaction, we preview and inspect each item thoroughly at the time of packaging. If an item has been shipped out from our warehouse in a damaged or flawed condition, MaxAroma accepts 100% responsibility for that item.\nAll Returns and Exchanges, and any Refunds pertaining to those Returns and Exchanges, are dependent on the condition of the returned merchandise. Any Shipping and Handling charges will not be refunded in cases of Returns, Exchanges, or Cancellations (considering the order has already been shipped).\nFull Refund Policy\nTo receive a Full Refund on returned merchandise, the item(s) must be returned within 14 days of purchase date. The item(s) must be returned in the exact condition received by customer. Unless the item(s) was initially purchased as "Unboxed," the item(s) will need to be returned in their original, sealed, unused, undamaged, and fully packaged condition. If an item is not returned under the conditions mentioned, that item does not qualify for a Full Refund. If an item has been shipped out from our warehouse in a damaged or flawed condition, MaxAroma accepts 100% responsibility for that item.\nAny Shipping and Handling charges will not be refunded in cases of Returns, Exchanges, or Cancellations (considering the order has already been shipped). For further information on Partial Refunds, please refer to the Partial Refund & Restocking Fee section. Damaged, mismatched, or missing items cannot be returned or refunded (fully or partially). For further information on items that do not qualify to be returned or refunded, please refer to the Damaged, Mismatched, or Missing Items section.\nAny item that is qualified for a full or partial refund, may also qualify for store credit.\nPartial Refund & Restocking Fee Policy\nIf an item being returned has been opened, or otherwise not returned in the original condition in which it was received by customer, it may only qualify for a Partial Refund. All Returns and Exchanges, and any Refunds pertaining to those Returns and Exchanges, are dependent on the condition of the returned merchandise. Any Shipping and Handling charges will not be refunded in cases of Returns, Exchanges, or Cancellations (considering the order has already been shipped). If an item has been shipped out from our warehouse in a damaged or flawed condition, MaxAroma accepts 100% responsibility for that item.\nIf the item(s) being returned has been opened and the seal has been broken, there is a 25% Restocking Fee which will be deducted from the total refund amount. Any item that is qualified for a full or partial refund, may also qualify for store credit.\nExchanges\nIn order to be able to exchange merchandise, the item(s) must be returned within 30 days of purchase date. The item(s) must be returned in the exact condition received by customer. Unless the item(s) was initially purchased as "Unboxed," the item(s) will need to be returned in their original, sealed, unused, undamaged, and fully packaged condition. If an item is not returned under the conditions mentioned, that item does not qualify for an exchange. Damaged, mismatched, or missing items cannot be exchanged. Any Shipping and Handling charges will not be refunded in cases of Returns, Exchanges, or Cancellations (considering the order has already been shipped). If an item has been shipped out from our warehouse in a damaged or flawed condition, MaxAroma accepts 100% responsibility for that item. Any item that is qualified for an exchange, may also qualify for store credit.\nCancellation Policy\nHere at MaxAroma, we aim to provide the fastest and most efficient service within the range of our capability. This means that our shipping department processes and ships orders as soon as possible, in the order they are received. Orders placed prior to 11:00 am Eastern Standard Time (EST) will be shipped the same day (business days only). Orders places after 11:00 am EST, will be shipped the following day before 1:00 pm EST (business days only). A tracking number will be sent to customers at the time of shipment. MaxAroma operates on business days only.\nOrders placed before 11:00 am EST, will not qualify for cancellation unless they have not yet shipped. Orders placed after 11:00 am EST must be cancelled by 11:00 am EST following the time of the purchase (business days only).\nIf you have not received a shipment confirmation e-mail, and would like to know if your order qualifies for cancellation, please contact us.\nIf an order has already been shipped, it may not be cancelled. Cancellation only applies to orders which have not yet been shipped. Any cancellation request after shipment will be considered a Return or Exchange case, and customer must follow our Returns and Exchanges Policy.\nCancellations must be requested via e-mails.\nSHOP BY CATEGORIES\nFRAGRANCES\nMEN\nWOMEN\nUNISEX\nKID\nTESTER /UNBOX\nMEN\nWOMEN\nUNISEX\nSAMPLES\nPERFUME\nBEAUTY SAMPLE\nBATH & BODY\nBODY MIST\nBODY LOTION\nBODY CREAM\nBODY BUTTER\nBODY OIL\nBODY WASH\nBODY BRONZING CREAM\nSKIN CARE\nFACE MOISTURIZER\nFACE WASH\nMAKEUP\nFOUNDATION\nPOWDER\nEYE LINER\nEYE SHADOW\nMASCARA\nBLUSH\nLIP STICK\nLIP GLOSS\nBRUSH\nAT HOME\nCANDLES\nSHOP BY BRAND\nAnnick Goutal\nBurberry\nCalvin Klein\nDolce & Gabbana\nGiorgio Armani\nHermes\nIssey Miyake\nJaguar\nLalique\nMichael Kors\nNarciso Rodriguez\nodor\nPaco Rabanne\nPlayboy\nRalph Lauren\nSalvatore Ferragamo\nVictoria\'s Secret\nView All\nFOLLOW US Fashion Women Summer Casual Sleeveless Evening Party Cocktail Short Mini DressHello!
